titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (S. 686) for the relief of the parents of Theresa Marie Schiavo.
Providing for consideration of the bill (S. 686) for the relief of the parents of Theresa Marie Schiavo.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-28, by Mr. Gingrey.

Rule provides for consideration of S. 686 with 10 minutes of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 17.

action.text: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 897, H. Res. 182 is laid on the table.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (S.686) for the relief of the parents of Theresa Marie Schiavo.
